Uhh and here's the <MIM hack (not including the add-on for the QuoteNPCs) but with more free space.

0x4225ED
81 39 3C 45 4E 44 75 2C C6 05 DC 5A 4A 00 00 A0
38 E6 49 00 24 FE A2 38 E6 49 00 A0 E8 E1 49 00
0C 03 A2 E8 E1 49 00 29 C0 A3 0C 5B 4A 00 40 89
45 D4 EB 32 B9 D8 5A 4A 00 8B 01 83 C1 08 03 01
81 38 3C 4D 49 4D 75 40 8B 01 83 C0 04 50 E8 C0
F2 FF FF 83 C4 04 A3 84 E1 49 00 83 05 E0 5A 4A
00 08 90 90 90 90 EB 7F 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90
90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90
90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 80 78 01 4C

0x41548E
0F 85 1C 02 00 00 B9 A8 E6 49 00 89 EA 29 DB 83
EA 04 83 FB 04 74 13 8B 01 89 02 43 83 E9 04 EB
EE 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 A1 84 E1 49 00 C1
E0 05 01 45 F4 01 45 FC EB 0C
